mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reverse_Receive ( system_id,operator_code,operator,operate_time, send_code,package_barcode,can_receive,reject_code,reject_message, create_time, update_time, yn,business_type) VALUES ( SEQ_REVERSE_Receive.NEXTVAL, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canReceive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rejectMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 1, #{receiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select system_id,operator_code,operator,operate_time, send_code,package_barcode,can_receive,reject_code,reject_message,business_type FROM Reverse_Receive WHERE yn = 1 AND package_barcode = #{packageCode} AND ROWNUM <= 1

select system_id,operator_code,operator,operate_time, send_code,package_barcode,can_receive,reject_code,reject_message,business_type FROM Reverse_Receive WHERE yn = 1 AND package_barcode = #{packageCode} AND send_code = #{sendCode} AND business_type = #{receiveType} AND ROWNUM <= 1

select system_id,operator_code,operator,operate_time, send_code,package_barcode,can_receive,reject_code,reject_message,business_type FROM Reverse_Receive WHERE yn = 1 AND package_barcode = #{orderId} AND send_code = #{sendCode} AND ROWNUM <= 1
mapper.update:
UPDATE Reverse_Receive
operator_code = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_code = #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
package_barcode = #{packageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
can_receive = #{canReceive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reject_code = #{rejectCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reject_message = #{rejectMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_type = #{receiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = SYSDATE
WHERE system_id = #{id}
